structural.description:
The Bank pays salaries and bonuses to players

Each time a player's token lands on or passes over GO, whether by throwing the dice or drawing a card, the Banker pays him/her a $200 salary.

structural.description:
Houses

you may buy and erect at any time as many houses as your judgement and financial standing will allow. But you must build evenly, ie., you cannot erect more than one house on any one property of any color-group until you have built one house on every property of that group.

You may then begin on the second row of houses, and so on, up to a limit of four houses to a property.

For example, you cannot build three houses on one property if you have only one house on another property of that group.
descriptions: Houses

you may buy and erect at any time as many houses as your judgement and financial standing will allow. But you must build evenly, ie., you cannot erect more than one house on any one property of any color-group until you have built one house on every property of that group.

You may then begin on the second row of houses, and so on, up to a limit of four houses to a property.

For example, you cannot build three houses on one property if you have only one house on another property of that group.
word_wrap_descriptions: Houses
you may buy and erect at any time as many houses as your judgement and financial
standing will allow. But you must build evenly, ie., you cannot erect more than
one house on any one property of any color-group until you have built one house
on every property of that group.
You may then begin on the second row of houses, and so on, up to a limit of four
houses to a property.
For example, you cannot build three houses on one property if you have only one
house on another property of that group.

structural.description:
players wishing to build must wait for some player to return or sell his/her houses to the Bank before building

When all the properties of a color-group are no longer mortgaged, the owner may begin to buy back houses at full price

structural.description:
In order to lift the mortgage, the owner must pay the Bank the amount of the mortgage plus 10% interest.

If you are the new owner, you may lift the mortgage at once if you wish by paying off the mortgage plus 10% interest to the Bank.
descriptions: In order to lift the mortgage, the owner must pay the Bank the amount of the mortgage plus 10% interest.
If you are the new owner, you may lift the mortgage at once if you wish by paying off the mortgage plus 10% interest to the Bank.
word_wrap_descriptions: In order to lift the mortgage, the owner must pay the Bank the amount of the
mortgage plus 10% interest.
If you are the new owner, you may lift the mortgage at once if you wish by
paying off the mortgage plus 10% interest to the Bank.

structural.description: If the mortgage is not lifted at once, you must pay the Bank 10% interest when you buy the property
descriptions: If the mortgage is not lifted at once, you must pay the Bank 10% interest when you buy the property
word_wrap_descriptions: If the mortgage is not lifted at once, you must pay the Bank 10% interest when
you buy the property
